description: The revelation that foreign intelligence used a Swiss company's devices for spying provokes outrage.
title: Swiss Crypto AG spying scandal shakes reputation for neutrality
title_page: Swiss Crypto AG spying scandal shakes reputation for neutrality - BBC News
maintext: To be fair, there are millions of Swiss who think deeply about these things, and who have campaigned hard for a less self-interested policy, certainly when it comes to banking and arms trading, both of which are now subject to much stricter regulation.
